Description: Somerville - Renovated 3-bed 1,5 bath apartment Great location, 0.5 miles from Union Square. The rent is $3,700 and includes water. Tenants pay for gas and electricity. Laundry in the building. Cat friendly. Private Deck Space 1 garage. Available 1/1/2024. Move-in costs are 1st, security deposit, and brokers fee. *No short-term lease
